channel.title: CVE Feed for GNOME -- libsoup
channel.description: The latest CVEs for GNOME -- libsoup

item.title: CVE-2017-2885|2024-09-17T03:32:40.423Z -- gnome -- libsoup
item.description: An exploitable stack based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the GNOME libsoup 2.58. A specially crafted HTTP request can cause a stack overflow resulting in remote code execution. An attacker can send a special HTTP request to the vulnerable server to trigger this vulnerability.
